body_html: Since Keras will work with Estimator API, we can put this integration in tf.estimator.inputs? I think you can actually just ingest your data from TFRecords source inside input_fn in Estimator API. Similarly, this will work with Experiment as well.
body_text: Since Keras will work with Estimator API, we can put this integration in tf.estimator.inputs? I think you can actually just ingest your data from TFRecords source inside input_fn in Estimator API. Similarly, this will work with Experiment as well.
body: Since Keras will work with Estimator API, we can put this integration in `tf.estimator.inputs`? I think you can actually just ingest your data from TFRecords source inside `input_fn` in Estimator API. Similarly, this will work with `Experiment` as well.
